name: Phoenix
title: Icarus
lore: A celestial bird of fire, Phoenix sacrifices its own life force to burn enemies and protect allies.

icarus_dive.name: Icarus Dive
icarus_dive.description: Phoenix dives forward, damaging and slowing enemies. Can be canceled early.

fireSpirits.name: Fire Spirits
fireSpirits.description: Summons fire spirits that can be launched at enemies, burning and slowing their attack speed.

sunRay.name: Sun Ray
sunRay.description: Channels a beam of light that damages enemies and heals allies based on max HP.

supernova.name: Supernova
supernova.description: Phoenix transforms into a burning sun. If the sun survives, Phoenix is reborn with full HP and abilities reset.
